name: COOKIE GUN
description:
Get ready to dodge obstacles and shoot enemies in this 2D shooter platformer!

Featuring:

  • Tasty COOKIES.
  • Precision PLATFORMING.
  • G U N .
  • Fast paced ORIGINAL SOUNDTRACK.
  • Full on CONTROLLER SUPPORT.

And more!

Check out the original soundtrack here!
